Jeanna Wiryanto & Liza Abdrashitova

Hybrid Environments

Hybrid Environments is a collaborative project between graphic design and illustration, focused on developing AR Wayfinding for the Camberwell College of Arts' 2025 Degree Show. The project highlights the tools and techniques used by design students, reimagining them as abstract elements inspired by those creative processes. Integrated into a wayfinding identity and aligned with UAL brand guidelines, the project introduces five AR installations across the college, providing an interactive way to navigate spaces between exhibitions and celebrating Camberwell�s workshops and processes.

designby-jw.xyz (Jeanna) & www.li-za.com (Liza)

Instagram: @designby_jn (Jeanna) & @li_za.art (Liza)
